price: 79. C’est Allah Qui a fait pour vous les bestiaux (pour que vous les utilisiez) comme montures ou nourriture.
arabic: ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِي جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلۡأَنۡعَٰمَ لِتَرۡكَبُواْ مِنۡهَا وَمِنۡهَا تَأۡكُلُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: al-lahu alladhī jaʿala lakumu al-anʿāma litarkabū min'hā wamin'hā takulūna
